attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, declare that Hummers which are over-sized, gas-guzzling, garishly painted, mileage-meager, energy-wasting, global-warming, road-hogging, backward-technology-embracing, inferiority-complex-compensating, cup-holder-infested "sports utility vehicles" are unsportsmanlike, non-utilitarian, and downright bad for the planet and should be banned. The H2 gets about 15 MPG, highway, (10 mpg street), large size/width, high maintenance cost, and potentially-destructive use as off-road. vehicles.
